detail_desc: Hat in a soft cable knit with a rib-knit fold-up hem.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a rib-knit fold-up hem.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in patterned sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in patterned sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and side stripes.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and side stripes.

Dress with a soft jersey top, visible zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on bow and a lined, flared skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.
Dress with a soft jersey top, visible zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on bow and a lined, flared skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.

Top in cotton jersey with a lace top layer at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Top in cotton jersey with a lace top layer at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a lace trim at the hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a lace trim at the hem.

Dress in cotton jersey with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative satin bow at the front, and a flared skirt in glittery tulle. Lined skirt.
Tiered skirt in stretch jersey containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Sturdy trainers in nylon and suede with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, leather insoles and chunky rubber soles.

Wide, calf-length dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, and long, wide sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with an opening and lacing at the sides.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Width 8 cm.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Width 8 cm.
Briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace details, a high waist, lined gusset and full coverage at the back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace details, a high waist, lined gusset and full coverage at the back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace details, a high waist, lined gusset and full coverage at the back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a small, ribbed, small stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in jersey made from a soft, organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.

Long-sleeved jersey top with a matching skirt in tulle. Top with reversible sequins at the front (sizes 1½-2Y with normal sequins). Lined skirt with an elasticated waist.

Ankle boots in imitation suede. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a long-sleeved cotton jersey top and cotton corduroy dungaree dress. Patterned top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Dungaree dress with adjustable straps with a press-stud, front pockets and a press-stud at the sides.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with textured-knit stripes, a button placket and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a hat and mittens in a fine knit containing glittery threads. Jersey-lined hat with a faux fur pompom on top and ribbed hem. Jersey-lined mittens with ribbed cuffs. Size 2-6 months with no thumbs.

Set with a pair of mittens and a hat with earflaps in a fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, ties under the chin and a fleece lining. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Size 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.

Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with woven details, a collar and button placket. Chest pocket with a button on the front, buttoned cuffs and press-studs at the crotch.
Long top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed turtle neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.

Push-up bra in lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Padded, popover jacket in woven fabric with a lined drawstring hood, taped zip at the top and drawstring hem. Flap front pocket with press-studs, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Lined.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with embroidery on the front. Adjustable straps with press-studs, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Chest pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in size 4-12M.
